text: Marino Masé (21 March 1939 – 28 May 2022) was an Italian actor. He appeared in more than 70 movies from 1961 until his death. His first movie was Romulus and the Sabines. He also appeared in Marco Bellocchio's Fists in the Pocket and Jean-Luc Godard's Les Carabiniers. He also played Lupo in The Godfather Part III (1991). Masé died in Rome, Italy on 28 May 2022 from a heart attack, at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Marino Masé
